settings.title: What if I'm not happy with my purchase?
settings.content: At RoyalOrnateâ„¢, we aim for 100% customer satisfaction. If, for any reason, you are not satisfied with your purchase, you have 14 days to return the product and receive a full refund. Please contact us through our customer service, and we will guide you through the return process.

settings.title: How can I reach out to RoyalOrnate?
settings.content: You can contact us through the contact form on our website. Additionally, we are also available via email at support@royalornate.com. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

settings.title: Is my order shipped for free?
settings.content: Yes, we offer free shipping for orders over $100. For international shipments, shipping fees may apply, depending on the destination.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.support_hours: Our customer service is available from Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM to 8:30 PM.

settings.title: About us
settings.content: RoyalOrnate offers a wide range of clothing and accessories designed to enrich everyday life. Our products blend convenience with style, catering to everyone's needs. Together, we make every day more beautiful and easier, enhancing your wardrobe with our carefully selected items.
